videos.title: This is Why the Bible is True  ✅📖
How God Saved Me, My Wife, and Our Marriage
videos.description:
She was confused over his newfound devotion to Christ—but one sermon changed everything. Joseph and Lily’s love story began on MySpace, blossomed through late-night gaming sessions, and eventually faced a spiritual crossroads. While Joseph’s life transformed after hearing Ray Comfort’s Hell’s Best Kept Secret, Lily struggled to understand his newfound passion for the gospel.

In this emotional testimony, discover how Joseph’s patience, prayer, and persistent sharing of the gospel ultimately led Lily to surrender her life to Christ. Witness the beauty of a marriage transformed by faith as they now share their journey of spiritual growth, unity, and joy in raising their children to know and love Jesus.

Famous Atheist Penn Jillette’s Insight on Christians Sharing Their Faith
Terrified to Share Your Faith? This Video WILL Help You Immediately.
videos.description:
Evangelism can be intimidating, discouraging, and even hated at times—but the love of Christ compels us to keep sharing the truth with others. In this video, we explore the struggles of evangelism: facing rejection, inadequacy, and fear of confrontation. But despite these challenges, the heart of evangelism is rooted in love—a love for God and for the lost.

videos.title: Joe Rogan Asked About JESUS, and This Response was Amazing
videos.description:
Joe Rogan has interviewed countless guests, but his recent conversation with Wesley Huff stands out. Ray Comfort couldn’t contain his excitement as Huff boldly discussed Jesus, the resurrection, and the law that brings the knowledge of sin. In this video, Ray unpacks their dialogue and shares practical tips on how to use these insights to share the gospel effectively. Stay tuned until the end, where Huff offers a powerful critique of Jordan Peterson’s ultimate view of Jesus. Don’t miss it!

Click here to watch the full interview with Joe Rogan and Wesley Huff:

videos.title: Hollywood Mocks God, Then This Happens
videos.description:
The devastating fires in Los Angeles have deeply impacted our hearts. We're praying for everyone affected, especially those who’ve lost their loved ones, their homes or have been displaced by these tragic events. While our ministry, Living Waters, is based in LA County, we are thankfully on the opposite side, far from the fires, and we truly appreciate your prayers.

In this video, Ray Comfort highlights a striking connection between celebrities mocking God at the Golden Globe Awards and later turning to prayer when the fires threaten their homes. These moments serve as a sobering reminder of life's fragility.

As Scripture says, “The grass withers and the flowers fall, but the word of our God endures forever” (Isaiah 40:8). In the face of loss, Christ is more than enough.

Watch as Ray Comfort interviews a woman who had to evacuate her home in the hills and shares the message of hope that can save her soul from the eternal flame.

videos.title: Why It’s Hard for Hollywood to Say Sorry to God
videos.description:
Ray Comfort has been accused of mocking God more than Hollywood in light of the Los Angeles fires. But is there any truth to this claim? In the video "Hollywood Mocks God, and This Happens," Ray clarifies his original position, explaining that while we cannot definitively say the LA fires are God's judgment, we do know that God sends both rain and sunshine. It's challenging to attribute God's judgment of Hollywood to a single event. However, over the past 40+ years, Hollywood has consistently mocked God, distorted truth, glorified sensuality, and exalted sin. Could this be storing up the wrath of God, as the Bible warns?

In this video, Ray Comfort addresses these claims and uses this moment to share the hope of the gospel in a world desperate for truth and redemption.

Our hearts also go out to the families who have lost their homes during these tragic events.

videos.title: Is America Experiencing the Same Consequences as Ancient Israel?
videos.description:
With the news about President Donald Trump's inauguration, Is America on the brink of revival? As we face unprecedented challenges—rising debt, lawlessness, natural disasters, and moral decline—we’re reminded of the parallels between modern America and ancient Israel. When Israel forsook God’s law, the consequences were severe, but there was always a path to restoration: repentance. Could the same be true for our nation?

Drawing attention to the normalization of blasphemy in Hollywood films, Ray highlights shocking statistics about the casual use of Jesus’ name as a curse word in award-winning movies and contrasts this with the cultural reverence—or fear—surrounding Islam.

videos.title: Confronting Islam: Defending the Bible Against Radical Lies | Official Trailer | EQUIP
videos.description:
Explore EQUIP's free video bundle featuring practical answers to tough questions about Islam: https://livingwaters.tv/checkout/new?o=203030

Islam remains one of the fastest-growing man-made religions, with many attempting to draw closer to a false god. Sharing your faith with a well-informed Muslim can be challenging, but we’re here to help. Don’t miss EQUIP’s January video release, where we tackle tough questions about Islam. This series features powerful insights from James White, Jay Smith, Justin Peters, and more!

Quickly recognize when God’s Word is being misinterpreted by addressing questions such as:

How can you effectively share the gospel with a Muslim?
Where are the original manuscripts of the Bible?
Did Jesus ever claim to be God and call people to follow Him?
Does Muhammad meet the qualifications of a true prophet?
Muslims say the Trinity cannot be true—how can God die?
Why do Muslims argue that Allah does not need to atone for sin?
How can you discuss Muhammad without offending a Muslim?
Is it necessary to understand Arabic to read and interpret the Quran?

Claim your free bundle today on LivingWaters.tv: https://livingwaters.tv/checkout/new?o=203030

videos.title: Watch the gospel make sense to her 🙏✝️
50 Atheists Surrounded a Christian and This Happened…
videos.description:
Ray Comfort finds himself face-to-face with 50 atheists protesting outside a Creation Museum in Southern California. Instead of debating in the heat, he invites them inside for an air-conditioned discussion about the existence of God.

Through years of experience debating some of the world's most well-known atheists—including Professor Lawrence Krauss—Ray has developed a powerful approach to challenging unbelief. In this video, he dismantles the idea that "nothing created everything" and explains why atheism is not an intellectual issue but a moral one.

videos.title: Who Killed JFK? What No one is Telling You
videos.description:
Who really killed JFK? For decades, the official story has pointed to Lee Harvey Oswald acting alone, but newly declassified files reveal shocking details that challenge this narrative. From CIA involvement to mafia connections, multiple shooters, and government cover-ups, the assassination of President John F. Kennedy remains one of the greatest murder mysteries in American history.

More importantly, this tragic event serves as a reminder that life is fragile. One moment you can have wealth, power, and fame—the next, it can all be gone in an instant. But what truly matters when we face eternity? Stay until the end for a conversation that could change your life.

videos.title: Defending the Faith
Rescued Astronaut Reveals Shocking Truth
videos.description:
While space rescues are thrilling, nothing compares to the rescue mission that took place 2,000 years ago, when Jesus came down from heaven to save lost sinners. Butch Wilmore, a NASA astronaut, has spent over nine months in space, but his greatest mission isn't just among the stars, it’s his faith in Jesus Christ. In this powerful video, you'll hear him speak about God’s glory, the foolishness of evolution, and the everlasting gospel that changes lives.

videos.title: Reporter Punched in the Face
Four Men Wreck a Roof
“God is Pure Evil”
Atheist Hears the Genius of God
When it’s OK to Kill THIS
Why the church is filled with false converts
videos.description:
The modern gospel often begins with, “God loves you and has a wonderful plan for your life.” But what if that plan includes being stoned like Stephen, whipped like Paul, or imprisoned like countless believers through history? Walk someone through the book of Acts, or trace the word “suffering” through the Epistles, and then ask them to say, “Wonderful.” After such a journey, the pleasures of sin may seem more appealing than the call to “suffer affliction with the people of God.”

This soft-sell gospel message centered on happiness instead of holiness has produced something tragic: countless false converts in the American church. When we bypass the Law and fail to confront sin, we fill churches with people who think they’re saved... but aren’t. They came for a better life, not eternal life. They never saw their guilt before a holy God, never trembled at judgment, and never truly repented.

Jesus didn’t promise comfort. He brought conviction. He used the Ten Commandments to expose the heart, reveal sin, and show the righteousness of God (Luke 10:25–27; 18:18–20). Only then can someone truly see their need for the Savior.

The cross is the ultimate expression of God’s love (John 3:16; Rom. 5:8; 1 John 4:10) but that love is meaningless unless we understand what it cost, and why it was necessary. How can we speak of the cross without sin? And how can we understand sin without the Law (Rom. 7:7)? As Ray Comfort says, “The Law is the needle, and the gospel is the thread, you can’t sew without both.”

If we preach a gospel that skips over sin, judgment, and the fear of the Lord, we may gain decisions, but we lose true conversions. The gospel doesn’t promise an easy life; it offers eternal life through repentance, righteousness, and the grace of God in Christ. And that is truly wonderful.
